amendment.description: To prevent unwarranted tax cuts for the ultra-rich.

action.text: Amendment SA 454 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive all applicable budgetary discipline with respect to amendment SA 454 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 52. Record Vote Number: 62.
Point of order that the amendment violates section 305(b)(2) of the CBA raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 454.
Amendment SA 454 proposed by Senator Schumer.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 454 proposed by Senator Schumer.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive all applicable budgetary discipline with respect to amendment SA 454 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 52. Record Vote Number: 62.
